summary: This document is an email containing a link to a 2015 Radar Online article about a Hollywood actress who was a victim in the Jeffrey Epstein sex scandal. The email appears to be forwarding or referencing this media report.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the sex scandal referenced in the linked article.

events.title: Radar Online article on Epstein victim
events.description: Radar Online published an exclusive article about a Hollywood actress who was a victim in the Jeffrey Epstein sex scandal.

keyFacts: The document references a 2015 Radar Online article about the Jeffrey Epstein sex scandal.
The article specifically mentions a Hollywood actress as a victim of Epstein.
The email forwarding this link is dated October 28, 2021.
